name: Joust on Time
description:
Buy new equipment as you earn resources.

Upgrade your knight to challenge stronger knights.

Joust and defeat the local knights until you are prepared to defeat the Royal Knight in the King's Joust.

CONTROLS

SPACE to lower your spear. You can only start the movement once per round, so time it wisely, since there is a DELAY !

Late submitted for Trijam #82 - Theme: Delay

All art, music and code were created in 3... days.

Art & Audio by Draelent: Itch / SoundCloud

Programmed by miguelsgp: https://miguelsgp.itch.io/

Horse riding and hit effects: free open sounds from freesound.org
